lumberMill.name: Lumber Mill
lumberMill.description: Can only be built on forest tiles. Provides production bonus.

mine.name: Mine
mine.description: Can only be built on hills or mountains. Provides production and gold.

farm.name: Farm
farm.description: Can only be built on plains. Adds 2 population to the city.

workshop.name: Workshop
workshop.description: Adds 1 population to the city and provides production bonus.

windmill.name: Windmill
windmill.description: Adds 1 population to the city and provides production bonus.

forge.name: Forge
forge.description: Adds 1 population to the city and provides production bonus.

sawmill.name: Sawmill
sawmill.description: Can only be built on forest tiles. Adds 1 population to the city and provides production bonus.
